amendment.description: Amendment requires the Attorney General to create a national register of cases of child abuse or neglect with information in such register supplied by States, or, at the option of a State, by political subdivisions of such State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to create a national child abuse registry within the Department of Justice. The amendment also requires the Attorney General to work in consultation with the Secretary of HHS in creating the database.
